items.text: flat, back of a length, spins the other way, punches to point. Rahim wants the second and takes off but Thisara's throw slips out of the hand

items.text: huge shout for leg before, given, and Rahim has reviewed. Legbreak, looped up and sliding on leg before spinning away to hit him on the middle and leg channel. Mushfiqur probably didn't pick the variation and got down to sweep with no room. No bat. Pitching just outside leg Very good review

items.text: now the conventional sweep. He was getting just a little itchy and he has swept to the wrong length. A legbreak that bounces a little more and takes the top edge before settling into the hands of short fine leg
